actions.name: Actions
actions.description:
Multi-Attack: 1×Tail and 1×Death Ray Death Ray [Cast, Remote | Endure] (Recharge Cd4):
24 (8d6) and +1 Fatigue Tail [Melee Attack]: 3 (d6) and pass an [Endure] Save or knocked Prone and be Dazed for 1 Round.

abilities.name: Abilities
abilities.description: Stench: Non-Catoblepas Beings that have to breathe are Sickened (Hinder on all Checks) while Near it.
